families.name: LS 6000 LEVEL SWITCH

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

options.name: CPVC Probe
options.notes: CPVC Blind End Probe with Integrated NPT Nipple - 4" Standard, plus $50 per additional inch

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
3/4" NPT process connection is optional at no extra charge (3/4" NPT Max 300 psi @ 75 F).
notes: Delrin insulators are standard for SS probes. Teflon insulators are standard for Halar and Teflon Sleeve probes.
Max Temperatures: Delrin insulator 250F; Teflon insulator 450F; PEEK insulator 550F.
Do not use Delrin in applications with STEAM.
Cable probes and special materials of construction available.
Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.

families.name: Spare Parts:
notes: 1. Cable probes and special materials of construction available.
2. ¾" NPT process connection is optional at no extra charge (¾" NPT Max 300 psi @ 75 F)
3. Max Temp for Teflon Insulator 450F, PEEK Insulator 550F
4. On board timer often used to pump down sumps or avoid nuisance alarms due to splashing.
5. LONGEST PROBE WITH HALAR COATING IS 72" (6 FEET). FOR PROBES OVER 72", USE TEFLON SLEEVE.

families.name: Spare Parts:
notes: 1. LS 7000/2 IS DESIGNED TO AUTOMATICALLY FILL OR AUTOMATICALLY EMPTY A VESSEL. Has only one relay dedicated to auto fill or auto emptying.
2. Designed to work in homogeneous liquids. Not for liquids that change in conductivity.
3. Must have a Halar coated probe in electrically conductive liquids.
4. Must be grounded to the liquid for best repeatability.
5. Material sticking on probe will affect setpoint repeatability.
6. For critical filling applications, a separate independent high level switch is recommended.
7. Does not work well in dry materials.
8. LONGEST PROBE WITH HALAR COATING IS 72" (6 FEET). FOR PROBES OVER 72", USE TEFLON SLEEVE.

families.name: Spare Parts:
notes: 1. Remote mounted LS 8000 receiver is normally sold without an enclosure.
2. Transmitters come in several sensitivities.
3. Transmitter sensitivities: HI, M/H, MED, LO, LLLO, XLO
4. Transmitters come in two sizes: "small" for standard LS 8000 housing, "big" for LS 7000 housing.
5. Cable probes and special materials of construction available.
6. LONGEST PROBE WITH HALAR COATING IS 72" (6 FEET). FOR PROBES OVER 72", USE TEFLON SLEEVE.

families.name: LS 8000/2 REMOTE MOUNTED DUAL POINT LEVEL SWITCH
TRAN-EX PRICING:

options.name: 10" X 8" X 4" NEMA 4 METAL ENCLOSURE FOR RECEIVER
GRK EXP PROOF ENCLOSURE FOR RECEIVER (w/ 2-3/4" conduit entries)

notes: 12 VDC, 24VDC, AND 240VAC AVAILABLE AT NO EXTRA CHARGE
H=Halar Coated Probe
TS=Teflon Sleeve
Materials U and T are NOT available for dual point switches
Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon and Ryton) - consult factory
1. With two receiver cards you can get 4 set points in an LS 8000/2 system on one probe.
2. Systems with multiple set points on one probe are designed for homogeneous liquids.
3. For multiple points on one probe, the fluid must be grounded to the mounting nipple.
4. Applications with water based or electrically conductive liquids must have a Halar coated probe.
5. Material sticking on the probe will affect the repeatability of set points.
6. LONGEST PROBE WITH HALAR IS 72" (6 FEET). FOR PROBES OVER 72", USE TEFLON SLEEVE.

families.name: Spare Parts:
notes: 1. It is always good engineering practice to provide a separate, independent high level alarm.
2. Designed to be used in electrically conductive liquids that do not leave a residue on the probe.
3. Will give a varying output if the conductivity of the material changes.
4. Must be grounded to the fluid. In non-metallic tanks, extra grounding provisions may be necessary.
5. LONGEST PROBE WITH HALAR IS 72" (6 FEET). FOR PROBES OVER 72", USE TEFLON SLEEVE.
6. For high temperatures or harsh acids, check with the factory for epoxy compatibility.

families.name: These units are replacement units for Princo P/N's L3515 and L3545.
notes: 1. These units are replacement units for Princo P/N's L3515 and L3545.
2. Standard flanges are 316SS Flat Face Flanges.

families.name: Spare Parts:
notes: Max. probe length recommended is 24".
For detecting emissions before they are visible, recommend air velocities in excess of 2000 feet per minute.
VELOCITY IN FEET PER MINUTE = CFM / ((Duct Dia. In Feet)² × 0.78)
